DataElement.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Greater Than One Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the ECOG Performance Status is greater than one.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: ECOG Performance Status Greater Than One Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.

Concepts.definition: A performance status scale designed to assess disease progression and its affect on the daily living abilities of the patient.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
